homeContent.title: About
homeContent.subSlogan: It makes every day a shining moment.
homeContent.description: Glassy Matcha is more than just a brand that sells matcha — we promise to grow into a relationship-driven brand that brings diverse emotions and content, turning every moment of people’s lives into something bright and sparkling.

homeContent.title: Cafe
homeContent.subSlogan: The hottest spot on the east side of Jeju
homeContent.description: Visit us at 112 Johamhaean-ro, Jocheon-eup, Jeju Special Self-Governing Province to enjoy drinks and desserts made with the finest locally grown Jeju matcha — all while taking in stunning ocean views and experiencing true relaxation.

homeContent.title: Products
homeContent.subSlogan: The perfect sweetness — blended with natural sugar and alternative sweeteners
homeContent.description: By preserving traditional processing methods passed down from our ancestors, we’ve reduced bitterness and achieved a delicate, smooth, and clean finish — making our matcha enjoyable even for first-timers.

homeContent.title: Matcha Test
homeContent.subSlogan: The one and only Glassy Matcha — made just for you
homeContent.description: Matcha straight? Matcha mojito? Matcha latte? Find the menu that suits you best and savor it at Glossy Matcha!

intro.title: LIFE WITH GLOSSY
intro.slogan: We make every day a shining moment.

description.paragraph-1: Glossy Matcha provides sparkling energy for everyone, helping them find their own joy and happiness, and making every moment of their lives shine.
description.paragraph-2: Glossy Matcha promises to grow into a relational brand filled with diverse emotions and content, not just a brand that sells matcha, but one that brightens everyday life.
description.paragraph-3: Glossy Matcha aims to help you find sparkle in your life, in the small everyday moments, starting with the little things together.
description.paragraph-4: We are a brand that offers genuine products, content, and campaigns that can become a part of your daily life, promoting sustainable coexistence.

item-1.title: LIGHT
item-1.desc: We pursue the shining moments of Jeju and everyday life.

item-2.title: NATURAL
item-2.desc: We constantly seek and research ways to live in harmony with nature.

item-3.title: TRAVEL
item-3.desc: We offer a lifestyle that can be enjoyed alongside travel.

intro.title: RELAX WITH GLOSSY
intro.slogan: Glossy Matcha gifts you true relaxation.

description.paragraph-1: Matcha is the finest tea from Jeju. Glossy Matcha uses only 100% organic matcha of the highest quality.
description.paragraph-2: It captures the vibrant green vitality created by Jeju's pristine nature. The calming green aroma offers comfort and relaxation to all.
description.paragraph-3: The unique sweet yet rich aroma of matcha is a harmonious blend of freshness and gentle bitterness.
description.paragraph-4: Fill your body and mind with health and the refreshing spirit of green.

item-1.title: Organic First Flush Leaves
item-1.description: Made from 100% organic first flush tea leaves grown in Seogwipo Eco Farm, delivering a smoother and richer taste.

item-2.title: Sustainable Future
item-2.description: We collaborate with local farmers and artisans who care for the environment, moving toward a healthier and more sustainable future.

item-3.title: Commitment to Quality
item-3.description: Through processing techniques and distribution management backed by years of expertise, we produce matcha of the highest quality.
